verbs.description: [ARG0: President Jimmy Carter] [V: criticized] [ARG1: Trump administration US foreign policy] [ARGM-LOC: in an interview with CNN 's Dr. Sanjay Gupta] . Carter was honored with a public health award on Wednesday .
President Jimmy Carter criticized Trump administration US foreign policy in an interview with CNN 's Dr. Sanjay Gupta . Carter [V: was] honored with a public health award on Wednesday .
